name: Forever Blossom Frame 🌸✨
description: Capture your eternal love with the Forever Blossom Frame. Perfect for Valentine's Day, anniversaries, or just to say ‘I love you’ 💖. Adorned with delicate flowers 🌼, golden flakes ✨, and personalized details, it’s a timeless keepsake for your cherished moments.

name: Preserve Your Special Rose🌹
description: Preserve the rose given by someone special in this beautiful resin coaster. Perfect for cherishing moments like Valentine's Day, anniversaries, and more. A timeless keepsake for your precious memories. 🌹✨

name: Carry Love Everywhere✨
description: Personalized resin initial keychain with real rose petals and gold flakes — a perfect blend of elegance and sentiment. Gift it to someone special or keep your initial close to your heart. ❤️✨🔑!

name: Letters of Love💖
description: Preserve memories in style with custom resin letters filled with vibrant blooms. A heartfelt keepsake for couples, friends, or family to celebrate love and connection. 💖🌿

name: Daisy Jhumka 🌼✨
description: Elegant jhumka-style earrings featuring real daisy flowers encased in resin, paired with intricate silver detailing and delicate hanging beads. A perfect blend of nature’s charm and traditional grace. 🌿

name: Vibrant Memories Coaster 🌈✨
description: Brighten up your space with the Vibrant Memories Coaster! A splash of colorful stones 🌟, cute stickers 🐻, and delicate dried flowers 🌼 make it the perfect personalized keepsake. Add your favorite photo 📸 and name to create a fun, cheerful memento for any occasion.

name: 💍 Forever Love Wedding Frame 💑
description: Preserve your special day with this beautiful resin wedding keepsake frame ✨. Featuring your photo, names, date, and elegant details like dried flowers 🌸 & pearls 🤍, it’s a perfect memory to cherish forever ♾️. Customizable to make it uniquely yours! 💖

name: Sunshine Bloom Keychain 🌻✨
description: Carry a little sunshine wherever you go with the Sunshine Bloom Keychain! This vibrant yellow charm features a stunning dried sunflower 🌼, delicate golden flakes ✨, and a personalized name touch. A tiny pearl heart 🤍 adds a sweet detail, making it the perfect gift for someone special—or for yourself!

name: Ocean Bliss Keychains 🌊
description: Carry a piece of the ocean wherever you go! These charming keychains blend natural shells, tiny aquatic details, and crystal-clear resin to create a peaceful lagoon effect, making them a perfect keepsake or gift.

name: 📸 Mini Memory Keychain ✨
description: Carry your favorite moments wherever you go with this custom resin photo keychain 💖. Decorated with dried flowers 🌸 and shiny flakes ✨, it’s the perfect little keepsake to keep your memories close! 🗝️.

name: 🌟 Tiny Treasures Memory Frame 🌟
description: Capture the magic of your baby's first moments with the Tiny Treasures Memory Frame 👶💖. This resin masterpiece holds precious keepsakes like baby bracelets, adorable photos, and birth details 🗓️⏰, decorated with seashells 🐚 and personalized touches for a timeless memory.

name: Grain Essence Letters 🌾
description: A unique resin art piece featuring the letters PTC embedded with natural grains, showcasing the raw beauty of seeds and pulses. Mounted on a wooden base, it symbolizes growth, abundance, and earthy elegance.
